meanings.definition: A group of people united by kinship and descent.
meanings.sent1: The clans gathered around the fire to share stories of their ancestors.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, clans often lived together in close-knit communities.
meanings.sent3: The clans decided to have a friendly competition to see who could bake the best bread.
meanings.sent4: The clans were like branches of a family tree, each with its own unique history.
meanings.sent5: The image of the clans standing together in unity was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A group with a common interest or goal.
meanings.sent1: The gaming clans worked together to defeat the final boss in the game.
meanings.sent2: Environmental clans joined forces to protect the endangered species in the area.
meanings.sent3: The book club clans met every week to discuss their latest read.
meanings.sent4: The clans of artists painted the town with vibrant colors and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The clans of volunteers dedicated their time to help those in need.
